oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic plant breeding and seed production in Baltic States: developments and challenges
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BELICKA, Ina
BLEIDERE, Mara
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper the current situation in plant breeding, variety testing for organic agriculture and organic seed production in the Baltic States, tasks for future are described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: BELICKA, Ina and BLEIDERE, Mara (2006) Organic plant breeding and seed production in Baltic States: developments and challenges. Paper at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
